Sql.query: SELECT DC.CATCODI, DC.DATACATCODI, DC.DESDATACAT, DC.DESCORTADATACAT, DC.VALOR FROM CAM_DATACATALOGO DC INNER JOIN CAM_CATALOGO C ON C.CATCODI = DC.CATCODI WHERE C.CATCODI = :CATCODI AND C.INDDEL =:INDDEL AND SYSDATE BETWEEN C.FECINIVIGENCIA AND C.FECFINVIGENCIA ORDER BY DC.VALOR ASC
SELECT ZONACODI, TRIM(ZONANOMB) || ' (' || TRIM(ZONAABREV) || ')' AS DESCRIP FROM TR_ZONA_SP7 WHERE ZONANOMB LIKE 'SE %' ORDER BY ZONANOMB

SELECT DC.CATCODI, DC.DATACATCODI, DC.DESDATACAT, DC.DESCORTADATACAT, DC.VALOR FROM CAM_DATACATALOGO DC INNER JOIN CAM_CATALOGO C ON C.CATCODI = DC.CATCODI WHERE C.INDDEL =:INDDEL AND SYSDATE BETWEEN C.FECINIVIGENCIA AND C.FECFINVIGENCIA ORDER BY DC.VALOR ASC
